name: restful-api-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol server for RESTful API operations and JSON Server
author: Mikdanjey <mikdanjey@gmail.com> (MikdanTech.com)

scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup:env: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('.env')) { fs.copyFileSync('.env.example', '.env'); console.log('Created .env file from .env.example - please update it with your configuration'); } else { console.log('.env file already exists'); }"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run type-check && tsc
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run type-check && tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.clear: rm -rf dist node_modules coverage .scannerwork package-lock.json yarn.lock next-env.d.ts yarn-error.log eslint-report.json output.log snowflake.log error.log
